name: TaxAct 2018 Tax Return Backup File
summary: A BA8 file is a backup tax return created by the 2018 version of TaxAct, a tax-preparation program. It contains tax data for the 2018 tax year, which is used for archival purposes and in case the .TA8 tax return file is lost or becomes corrupt. BA8 files store federal IRS and state tax form data along with basic personal information, such as the name and occupation of the user.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
